metadata.name: Tutorial Challenge Decks
metadata.description: Beginner-friendly challenge decks for tutorial: Elena's social service and Thomas's warehouse work. Lower danger thresholds and forgiving card distributions teach mechanics without punishing new players.
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

socialChallengeDecks.name: Evening Service
socialChallengeDecks.description: Help Elena serve evening customers - a gentle introduction to social challenges through service work. Heavy Rapport/Insight focus, minimal Authority/Cunning. Teaches conversation basics without high tension.

physicalChallengeDecks.name: Warehouse Work
physicalChallengeDecks.description: Move crates and organize supplies at Thomas's warehouse - a safe introduction to physical challenges through structured work. Focus on careful, precise movements. No high-risk Brute Force. Teaches physical mechanics with minimal danger.
